caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling temperature settings via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Temperature increased.
Maximum temperature is 104°F (40°C).
When the value is set higher than the current temperature,
“Heating to XX”F (”C)” will be indicated.

Temperature decreased.
Minimum temperature is 65°F (18.33°C).
When the set value is lower than the current temperature
“Cooling to XX”F (”C)” will appear.

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling date settings via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Date and Time Settings
Scroll through the year, month, day blocks to adjust the date.

Once your date is set, click the water icon
on the left to confirm and get back to the main menu.

Date Block
Scroll this block up or down to adjust the year.

Once your date is set, click the water icon
on the left to confirm and get back to the main menu.

Month Block
Scroll this block up or down to adjust the block.

Once your date is set, click the water icon
on the left to confirm and get back to the main menu.

Day Block
Scroll this block up or down to adjust the day.

Once your date is set, click the water icon
on the left to confirm and get back to the main menu.

Date updated successfully
You're now back at the main menu.

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling time settings via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Time Settings
Scroll through the hour, minute and time format blocks to set the time.

Once your time is set, click the water icon
on the left to confirm and get back to the main menu.

Hour Block
Scroll this block up or down to adjust the hour.

Once your time is set, click the water icon
on the left to confirm and get back to the main menu.

Minute Block
Scroll this block up or down to adjust the minutes.

Once your time is set, click the water icon
on the left to confirm and get back to the main menu.

Time Format Block
Scroll this block up or down to change the time format between 24hr or 12hr AM / PM.

Once your time is set, click the water icon
on the left to confirm and get back to the main menu.

Time updated successfully
You're now back at the main menu.

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling jets via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Jet 1
Press this pad to activate the pump.

1st press – low speed (icon rotates slow)
2nd press – high speed (icon rotates fast)
3rd press – turns off

Note: Pump will automatically time-out after 15 minutes.

Jet 2
Press this pad to activate the pump.

1st press – high speed (icon rotates fast)
2nd press – turns off

Note: Pump will automatically time-out after 15 minutes.

Jet 2
Press this pad to activate the pump.

1st press – high speed (icon rotates fast)
2nd press – turns off

Note: Pump will automatically time-out after 15 minutes.

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling the light settings via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Light Function Key
Press this pad to activate the light

1st press: rotating colours
2nd press: solid blue colour
3rd press: solid green colour
4th press: solid red colour

Note: Pressing the light key in intervals less than three
seconds will scroll to the next colour. Once you have
selected the colour another press will turn the light off.

Light will automatically timeout after 60 Minutes.

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling water care mode via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Water Care Menu
The Water Care section will help you set up your ideal
filtration and heating settings.

Choose from Away, Beginner, Energy Savings, Super Energy Savings and
Weekender, depending on your needs.

Away From Home
In this mode the spa will always be in economy; the set
point will be reduced by 20°F (11C) and the filtration
can be reduced.

Note: The selected mode will be marked by
a green checkmark next to the mode's icon.

Standard
In this mode the spa will always be in economy.

Note: The selected mode will be marked by
a green checkmark next to the mode's icon.

Energy Saving
The spa will be in economy mode during the peak
hours of the day and resume normal mode on the
weekend.

Note: The selected mode will be marked by
a green checkmark next to the mode's icon.

Super Energy
The spa will always be in economy mode during peak
hours, every day of the week.

Note: The selected mode will be marked by
a green checkmark next to the mode's icon.

Weekender
The spa will be in economy mode from Monday to
Friday, and will run normally on the weekend.

Note: The selected mode will be marked by
a green checkmark next to the mode's icon.

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling filtration cycle schedules via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Water Care Settings
Your currently active mode is highlighted and marked by a green checkmark.
Click on it again to edit its filtration schedules.

Schedule Editing Menu
In this menu you can edit the selected
water care mode's filtration schedules.

Scheduling
You have several possibilities for the schedule
(Mon-Fri, weekend, every day, or single days). The
schedules will be repeated every week.

Time and Duration
The time and duration are set in 30 minute increments.
Once you have set the schedule, use Spa Function Icon to go
back. Ensure that you have selected the desired Water
Care option in the main Water Care menu.

Filtrater Cycle
The filtration schedule shown on the screen will apply to the main filtration pump.
Your spa uses a circulation pump configured to run 24 hours by default and the
screen will show you the purge setting instead of filtration.

The purges are pre-programmed for a fixed
number of minutes, therefore the duration will be set
to N/A on the screen, and only the start time can be modified.
Going back to the main menu...

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling reminders via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Reminders Menu
In this menu you can tap on either reminder to clear it.
This should be performed only once the operation has been completed
so that you get accurate reminders next time it needs cleaning.
Going back to the main menu...
Canceling changes
Confirming reminder reset

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling standby mode via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Standby ModeThe Standby mode allows you to service your spa.
Pumps will stop for 30 minutes, and automatically
restart after this time.

Once Standby mode has been activated a screen will
appear to show the pumps are stopped. The normal
spa page will return at the end of the maintenance.

Press Cancel to leave Standby mode and restart the spa.
Canceling changes

Standby Mode Activated
Pumps will now stop for 30 minutes,
and automatically restart after this time.
